categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: A Separatist refueling ship, also known as a fuel tanker, was a type of Separatist starship in use during the Clone Wars. One such ship, the Aurora, was commanded by Captain Jorm and unwittingly used as bait by the Galactic Republic during a Jedi strike team's mission to destroy the Separatist warship Starcrusher.
